text:
@realDonaldTrump Malaria drug widely touted by Dr. tRump for treating the new coronavirus showed no benefit in a large analysis of its use in U.S. veterans hospitals. There were more deaths among those given hydroxychloroquine versus standard care.
https://t.co/4Dvcpcr3pd
